sentence.Network_en: The hastily assembled stimulus packages were a throwback to naive Keynesianism.
sentence.Network_cn: 而匆忙出台刺激计划,则是向幼稚的凯恩斯主义的大退步.

sentence.Network_en: NARRATOR: It took a world war for Keynesianism to become government policy.
sentence.Network_cn: 旁白: 经过世界大战,凯恩斯理论变成了政府政策.

sentence.Network_en: Section Two targets on economic analysis of Keynesianism.
sentence.Network_cn: 第二节主要针对凯恩斯学派的财政政策展开经济分析.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 2012年3月19日 -  含义凯恩斯主义(Keynesianism):以英国资产阶级经济学家凯恩斯的经济学理论为基础,主张通过国家干预经济和有效需求管理来实现充分就业和经济增长的理论体系二.

list.abs: ...演变，被归纳为新古典(New classical)和新凯恩斯(new Keynesian)革命，前者拥护市场出清基础上的商业周期理论，后者则认为衰 …
原先新凯恩斯学派系（New Keynesian）跟新古典学派（Neoclassical）达成的理论融合（即所谓「新古典合成」（Neoclassical Synth…
in a keynesian model , government deficit spending energizes a depressed economy and can stimulate investment and consumption in the private sector .在凯恩斯模型中，政府赤字开支使低迷的经济恢复活力，而且能够刺激私人领域的投资和消费。
the new developments in post keynesian economics ., 后凯恩斯经济学的新发展.
global financial crisis and new - keynesian economics ., 全球金融危机与新凯恩斯主义经济学.

means.word_mean: 1. the economic theories of John Maynard Keynes who advocated government monetary and fiscal programs intended to stimulate business activity and increase employment
